descriptionEn: The annualized recurring revenue has reached 69.9 billion.

descriptionEn: Set to be released on February 14th, the upgrade pace becomes a new variable.

title: 从xAI联合创始人的“翻身”看行业格局：看全球顶尖AI企业的人才创业
description: 硅谷的顶尖力量：合在一起是熊熊烈火，分开了是分散的星辰。
titleZh: 从xAI联合创始人的“翻身”看行业格局：看全球顶尖AI企业的人才创业
titleEn: Observing the industry landscape from the "turnaround" of an xAI co-founder: A look at talent entrepreneurship in top global AI companies
descriptionZh: 硅谷的顶尖力量：合在一起是熊熊烈火，分开了是分散的星辰。
descriptionEn: Silicon Valley's top forces: together they are a blazing fire, apart they are scattered stars.

title: 这个人两次改写了中国的人工智能叙事
description: 两条微博相隔一年，两次疯传。
titleZh: 这个人两次改写了中国的人工智能叙事
titleEn: This person has rewritten China's AI narrative twice
descriptionZh: 两条微博相隔一年，两次疯传。
descriptionEn: Two Weibo posts, one year apart, went viral twice. How did a game producer suddenly become a prophet for China's large models? Even rewriting the direction of China's AI narrative twice?

title: 知道你所有隐私的人工智能现在急于出售广告赚钱

descriptionEn: Would you be worried?

title: DeepMind CEO：人工智能将带来丰富，但首先是十年的洗牌
description: 在这次采访中，哈萨比斯讨论了竞争、泡沫、计算能力、人才，并推测人工智能将如何重塑科学、医疗保健和未来设备的形式。
titleZh: DeepMind CEO：人工智能将带来丰富，但首先是十年的洗牌
titleEn: DeepMind CEO: AI will bring abundance, but first a decade of reshuffling
descriptionZh: 在这次采访中，哈萨比斯讨论了竞争、泡沫、计算能力、人才，并推测人工智能将如何重塑科学、医疗保健和未来设备的形式。
descriptionEn: In this interview, Hassabis discusses competition, bubbles, computing power, talent, and speculates on how AI will reshape science, healthcare, and the form of future devices.
